title: So, bilgewater music?
body: I was going through the league settings messing with sound which i ten to do a lot. In the music swap thing where you pick either classic music or the updated music, it still says "bilgewater" and "updated" but the bilgewater one is jut the classic. Can this actually be the bilgewater music, because  loved that music, but if you just change the name back it'd be fine. idk if this bug is just for me, i just wanted to tlel you guys.

replies.body:
Hey dullishhippo69!

We removed the music at the end of the Burning Tides event - however the UI won't change until next patch. This is currently working as intended.
thnx so much, i was just kinda super confused. THNX SO MUCH :D you are awesome with responding fast
But I liked the "YA YA YAYAYAYYA YAYAYAYYAYAYYA" =(
